title: Star Wars Outlaws Breaks a Ubisoft Tradition - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.12.24
description:
Go to http://factormeals.com/kindafunny50 and use code kindafunny50 to get 50% off your first box plus 20% off your next box.

Go to http://dragonsdogma.com to buy the game and start your epic quest today.

Go to http://robinhood.com/boost to subscribe to Robinhood Gold and get a 3% match on every dollar you transfer in from another retirement account. Offer good through April 30th.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:32 - Housekeeping
 - A new episode of Game Showdown is going down right after KFGD and it’s a 6-person Kinda Feudy episode featuring Lucy James, Kallie Plagge, and more. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - Today, come experience Pokemon like you’ve never experienced it before, through the eyes of a 44 year-old man. That’s right, the one-and-only Nick Scarpino will be playing his very first Pokemon game but with a twist, it’s a Nuzlocke!
           -  The Roper Report   -
00:13:43 - Star Wars Outlaws director says there are no map towers to climb out in the open world
00:27:07 - SuperChats
00:35:22 - Baldur’s Gate 3 wins Best Game at the 2024 BAFTA Games Awards
00:39:08 - Possibility Space is seemingly closing down
00:45:08 - IGN Live Dates and Location Revealed for 2024
00:51:17 - Around 100 Devs At Just Cause Studio Are Unionizing
00:52:34 - Ratchet & Clank 2016 got an update
00:53:35 - Wee News!
00:56:27 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
